ARABIC: بِسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلسَّمَآءِ ذَاتِ ٱلْبُرُوجِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: By Heaven with its Houses of the Zodiac,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I CALL TO witness the sky (bespangled) with the signs of the Zodiac,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: By the heaven with its impregnable castles;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: By oath of the heaven which contains the constellations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: By the heaven holding the Buruj.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I swear by the mansions of the stars,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: By the heaven, holding mansions of the stars,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: By the sky with its constellations,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: By the heaven adorned with big stars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: By the heaven with its Houses,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: By the sky, (displaying) the Zodiacal Signs;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: By the heaven, holding the big stars.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: By the heaven of the constellations!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: By the sky with the constellations.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: By the sky containing great stars
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [85:1] By the heaven of the constellations, the twelve constellations of the planets — as explained in [sūrat] alFurqān [Q. 25:61];
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And from his narration on the authority of Ibn 'Abbas that he said regarding the interpretation of Allah's saying (By the heaven, holding mansions of the stars): '(By the heaven, holding mansions of the stars) He says: Allah swears by the heaven which includes mansions of the stars; it is also said: He swears by the heaven which has mansions between heaven and earth; Allah knows that,
